content.description:
Super fun boulder I figured out while filling up gas when I was driving through town, it was pretty dirty with lots of lichen on the rock so I have no idea if it’s really been done before.

use the obvious double and mono pockets as starts with both feet out right, one foot on the small diagonal ledge. Move across the series of good crimps to a small jug on your upper left. From the small jug reach over the edge for a good hold to pull on to top out.
content.protection: I climbed with no pads since it’s over nice soft grass and not a tall problem, but if you brought pads you could put up a number of boulder problems if you bring a wire brush to clean the rock.
content.location: On the far right of the parking lot wall, right over perfectly manicured grass, on the left side of the convenience store
